text: Kaul (also spelled Koul; ) is the caste used by most of the Kashmiri Pandits in India. They are Brahmins who come from Kashmir. After the protest in 1991 from Muslims, all Kashmiri Pandits forcefully left their houses. Some famous Kashmiri Pandits are:- *Motilal Nehru *Jawaharlal Nehru *Indira Gandhi *Raaj Kumar, Bollywood actor *Jeevan, Bollywood actor *Mani Kaul, filmmaker Category:Kashmir Category:Hinduism
title: Kaul
